BartonFink's Semi-historical Abrams sight adapted for HSTV-L.
Original sight by BartonFink: https://live.warthunder.com/post/944445/en/

How to use:
1. Unzip us_hstv_l folder into the UserSights folder {PATH_TO_GAME_FOLDER}/War Thunder/UserSights (Or create UserSights folder if it doesn't exist).
2. Launch the game.
3. Put the vehicle in a crew slot and select the respective slot.
4. Go to Top left corner menu (three stripes)->Options->Common Battle Settings->Use alternative sight grid and pick the XM885 option.
5. Done!

All credit goes to the original author.

#modern #sight #hst...

Kurumi Tokisaki Universal Sight
Works with All vehicles

It is made based on the anime 'Date a Live' character Kurumi Tokisaki

한국어
토키사키 쿠루미 유저 조준경
모든 지상 장비에서 사용이 가능합니다

일본 애니메이션 '데이트 어 라이브'의 등장인물 토키사키 쿠루미를 토대로 제작하였습니다.

Modern Sight V2

Works with all vehicles!

INSTALL

  1. Put "ModernCrossV2.blk" in "all_tanks" folder. (WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks)
    *If you don't have these folders just create them with the same name.
  2. Press Alt+F9 "Reload custom sight" [In Game/Test Drive].
  3. Open Options/Common Battle Settings/Use alternative sight grid and select "ModernCrossV2".
